name: ðŸŽµ VIVEK MUSIC ðŸŽµ
description: A Telegram Music Player Bot by Vivek, written in Python with Pyrogram and Py-Tgcalls.

MONGO_DB_URI.description: Optional: For saving data. Get from cloud.mongodb.com

STRING_SESSION.description: Optional: For Voice Chat music. Get from @StringSessionBot

LOGGER_ID.description: Optional: Uses OWNER_ID if not set (Group ID for logs, must start with -100)

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Optional: Fill here your Heroku account API key (Leave blank if not needed)

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Optional: Fill here your app name (Same as first line app name)

AUTO_GCAST.description: Optional: Fill [True] for ON auto gcast/broadcast message (Leave blank to disable)

AUTO_GCAST_MSG.description: Optional: Auto broadcast message which will be auto broadcasted twice in a day

START_IMG_URL.description: Optional: Your start bot image URL (Get it from t.me/vTelegraphBot)
